demo.name: start
demo.intro: Your history of interactions will appear here

start.name: start
start.intro: You start this adventure in a valley with a dark lake on your right. The lake looks evil, so you should get away from it as soon as possible. You notice a magical, dark door on the mountainside. You need to get in as quickly as possible.

door.content: As the moon rises, you see an inscription "Ennyn Durin Aran Moria. Pedo Mellon a Minno. Im Narvi hain echant. Celebrimbor o Eregion teithant i thiw hin" appear on the door.

lake.content: The lake is dark and ugly and has the rumblings of a monster inside it. Definitely, don't throw any stones in it.

mellon.content: The password accepted, the door creaks open and you step inside.

friend.content: An dwarven door made with elven magic will not open with English.

cards.name: cards
cards.intro: You now enter a room that looks out of proportions. There is a table at the center, and a tiny door in the corner. The door is too small to enter. The room's soft pink walls are a comfort after the darkness outside.

table.content: As you examine the table, you notice a pack of cards and a small bottle.

pack of cards.content: Hmmm, curious. The queen of hearts seems to be missing from the pack.

table.content: As you examine the table, you notice a pack of cards and a small bottle.

door.content: The door can be opened, but it's too big for you to go in!

bottle.content: As you drink the magic potion in the bottle, you feel all tingly. Suddenly, you've shrunk down and everything is just too big. You realize you can now pass through the door!

control.name: control
control.intro: This next room feels sterile and daunting. A large pair of eyes follow you as you traverse the room. There's a table in the middle of the room. There's a door too, but it's locked.

table.content: As you examine the table, you notice a microscope and a cryptex.

microscope.content: Ok. So this is creepy. Someone has marked four levels on the microscope magnification knob. How can we tune the microscope? There's a handscribbled note next to the microscope.

note.content: This could be useful. The note says - You can tune the microscope using commands like "Set #". For example, use "Set 1" to set it to the first setting.

cryptex.content: This seems to be just like the movies! This cryptex has four numbers you can set. What four digit number should be set? And what is inside?

eyes.content: Apart from the fact that these eyes are really creepy, there's nothing that you can do with them.

table.content: As you examine the table, you notice a microscope and a cryptex.

1984.content: The cryptex opens and a key falls on the table. You could pick up the key and see what happens.

1.content: You eagerly peer into the microscope. A word focuses into the view as you set the magnification just right. The word is "LUV". It's very mini.

2.content: Another word starts appearing in the view as you reach the second setting. It's "PAX". Again, very mini.

3.content: Excitement rising, you tune into the third setting. This time, the word is "PLENTY". You're amazed at how mini it is.

4.content: You set the microscope to the highest setting. The word "TRUE" swims into view. As with the other words, it is quite mini.

key.content: The key seems to be an exact fit for the door! You walk over to the door, and lo, the key works. You walk into the next room, wondering what your next challenge will be.

unexplained.name: unexplained
unexplained.intro: The first things you notice as you walk into this new room are three agitated men sitting around a table. Each of them has an identifier stuck on their forehead. The first one has "man 1", the second "man 2",  and the third has "man 3"

table.content: You notice on the table, three bottles are kept, one each in front of the men. You wonder what you could do with them.

bottle 1.content: The bottle has a sticker that says "STRYCHNINE". It smells horrible!

bottle 2.content: The bottle has a sticker that says "RICIN". It smells horrible!

bottle 3.content: The bottle has a sticker that says "IOCANE". It smells horrible!

table.content: You notice on the table, three bottles are kept, one each in front of the men. You wonder what you could do with them.

man 1.content: The man says "Anybody want a peanut?". There is bottle in front of him on the table.

man 2.content: The man says (with a lisp) "You've reached this far already! Inconceivable!". There is bottle in front of him on the table.

man 3.content: The man says "You killed my father. Prepare to die!". There is a bottle in front of him on the table.

bottle 1.content: Woah woah woah! You can't just be drinking anything. This could really really kill you.

bottle 2.content: Are you really going to be drinking anything? This stuff is poison!

bottle 3.content: You drink the bottle. Man 2 looks at you quizically. He realizes that you are immune to this poison because you've been drinking small sips of Iocane for the last 20 years. He gets up, opens the door for you, and then kills himself.

height.name: height
height.intro: The mood becomes brighter as you step into this next room. It looks to be a shop of some kind. A shaggy haired man greets you as you step in. There is a door in the room, but it's locked with a heavy padlock.

man.content: The man appears quite wise and willing to help.

door.content: The padlock appears solid! This will require a special kind of key.

wand 1.content: As you examine the first wand, Ollivander says, "This one is made with Willow wood with a unicorn hair. 14 inches long."

wand 2.content: "This one is made with Vine wood a Dragon Heartstring core. It's 10Â¾ inches", Ollivander announces.

wand 3.content: "Made with Holly, this wand has a Phoenix feather core. It's 11 inches long", Ollivander says, with a flair of a seasoned wandmaker.

wand 1.content: Ollivander doesn't look too happy as you pick up the first wand. You immediately put it back.

wand 2.content: You pick up the second wand. No response from Ollivander - so that's a positive. You flick the wand, and wands and boxes go flying around the room. Ollivander quietly replaces them with a wry smile on his face.

wand 3.content: Wand 3 feels good in your hand. You point it at a candle stand and say "wingardium levi-o-sa" and the candle stand gently floats. This could be useful. What spell can you cast to open the door?

man.content: As you greet the man, he smiles at you. "Welcome to Ollivander's" he says. "What would you like to see? Go ahead - say it"

wands.content: "Of course" says Ollivander. "Why don't you choose from one of these?" Ollivander places three wands in front of you.

alohomora.content: Ah! The unlock spell, delivered with a flourish. The lock falls open and you can proceed to the next room.

boom.name: boom
boom.intro: This just gets weirder and weirder. You enter a room. A tense man is looking at the door. There's also a small box.

door.content: The door seems to be wired with TNT. This is useful. Only question is, how can we set it off!

man.content: The man appears to be talking to himself!

box.content: The box is filled with soup. Intriguing!

detonator.content: The detonator seems scary. Should you even pick it up?

man.content: The man turns to you, and bitterly says, "You are not your job, you're not how much money you have in the bank. You are not the car you drive. You're not the contents of your wallet. You are not your f***ing khakis. You are all singing, all dancing crap of the world."

Not sure if this will help, you punch the man, right across his face. With his teeth bloody, the man turns back to you. To your surprise, he is smiling. "This is your life, and it's ending one minute at a time.", he says. He takes out a detonator from his pocket and places it on the box.

detonator.content: You pick up the detonator and gingerly press the lever. With a huge explosion, the door breaks into smithereens. The man laughs hysterically and punches himself.

equation.name: equation
equation.intro: You now walk into a dark room. In the middle of the room, you barely make out a robot. It's dark, green eyes are shining in the darkness. There is no door.

robot.content: The robot looks hardy. You can't help but notice a look of resignation in it's eyes. You get a feeling that getting the information you need from it will be difficult.

equation.content: The equation reads x2-66x+1008=0. What do you say?

robot.content: "Brain the size of a planet, and here I am. You're going to ask me a stupid question aren't you? I hope you say the *magic word*.", says the robot.
"I think you ought to know I'm feeling very depressed. Hitting me is not particularly making me feel any better. Also, you're rude.", it intones.
"You're very rude. I wish you'd just be nice and say the *magic word* rather than trying to engage my enthusiasm because I haven't got one.", it says morosely.

please.content: "You think you've got problems? What are you supposed to do if you are a manically depressed android? No, don't try to answer that. I'm fifty thousand times more intelligent than you and even I don't know the answer. It gives me a headache just trying to think down to your level. Anyways, I've brought the question to the answer to the universe, life everything to this simple equation. One of the roots is the answer, which you have to say."

42.content: Congratulations! You've found the answer to the question! Tell the real GameMaster over Whatsapp/Zoom to complete this journey!

24.content: You still haven't figured out the point of this have you? So close, though.

magic word.content: "Don't be obtuse. That's not the magic word! You need my help? You need to say the *magic word*.". The robot looks exasperated.
